SongName: Damn It Feels Good to Be a Gangsta
Album: Best of the Geto Boys and Scarface
Lyric:
[by:白雪上的影子]
[id: dw_clbbvkqc]
[al:]
[ar:Geto Boys]
[ti:Damn It Feels Good To Be A Gangsta]

[00:09.26][01:01.85][01:26.31][01:36.82][02:06.39][02:30.92][03:45.86]Damn it feels good to be a gangsta

[00:24.16]A real gangsta-ass nigga plays his cards right

[00:26.97]A real gangsta-ass nigga never runs his fuckin mouth

[00:29.32]Cuz real gangsta-ass niggas don't start fights

[00:32.24]And niggas always gotta high cap

[00:34.65]Showin' all his boys how he shot em

[00:37.36]But real gangsta-ass niggas don't flex nuts

[00:39.94]Cuz real gangsta-ass niggas know they got em

[00:43.42]And everythings cool in the mind of a gangsta

[00:45.62]Cuz gangsta-ass niggas think deep

[00:48.12]Up three-sixty-five a year 24/7

[00:51.09]Cuz real gangsta ass niggas don't sleep

[00:54.18]And all I gotta say to you

[00:55.77]Wannabe, gonnabe, cocksuckin', pussy-eatin' prankstas

[00:58.82]Cuz when the fry dies down what the fuck you gonna do

[01:12.48]Verse 2

[01:28.51]Feedin' the poor and hepin out wit they bills

[01:31.33]Although I was born in Jamaica

[01:33.75]Now I'm in the US makin' deals

[01:39.34]I mean one that you don't really know

[01:41.81]Ridin' around town in a drop-top Benz

[01:44.62]Hittin' switches in my black six-fo'

[01:47.56]Now gangsta-ass niggas come in all shapes and colors

[01:50.23]Some got killed in the past

[01:52.68]But this gangtsa here was a smart one

[01:55.20]Started living for the lord and I'll last

[01:58.09]Now all I gotta say to you

[01:59.88]Wannabe, gonnabe, pussy-eatin' cocksuckin' prankstas

[02:03.46]When the shit jumps off what the fuck you gonna do

[02:15.02]Verse 3

[02:33.02]A real gangta-ass nigga knows the play

[02:35.84]Real gangsta-ass niggas get the flyest of the bitches

[02:38.61]Ask that gangsta-ass nigga Little Jake

[02:41.39]Now bitches look at gangsta-ass niggas like a stop sign

[02:43.96]And play the role of Little Miss Sweet

[02:46.42]But catch the bitch all alone get the digit take her out

[02:49.13]and then dump-hittin' the ass with the meat

[02:52.26]Cuz gangsta-ass niggas be the gang playas

[02:54.59]And everythings quiet in the clique

[02:57.14]A gangsta-ass nigga pulls the trigger

[02:59.45]And his partners in the posse ain't tellin' off shit

[03:02.80]Real gangsta-ass niggas don't talk much

[03:05.30]All ya hear is the black from the gun blast

[03:08.18]And real gangsta-ass niggas don't run for shit

[03:10.52]Cuz real gangsta-ass niggas can't run fast

[03:13.58]Now when you in the free world talkin' shit do the shit

[03:16.36]Hit the pen and let the mothafuckas shank ya

[03:18.72]But niggas like myself kick back and peep game

[03:21.76]Cuz damn it feels good to be a gangsta

[03:31.78]Verse 4

[03:44.02]And now, a word from the President!

[03:48.16]Gettin voted into the White House

[03:50.62]Everything lookin good to the people of the world

[03:53.64]But the Mafia family is my boss

[03:56.52]So every now and then I owe a favor gettin' down

[03:59.90]like lettin' a big drug shipment through

[04:02.00]And send 'em to the poor community

[04:04.52]So we can bust you know who

[04:07.26]So voters of the world keep supportin' me

[04:09.76]And I promise to take you very far

[04:12.42]Other leaders better not upset me

[04:15.14]Or I'll send a million troops to die at war

[04:18.11]To all you Republicans, that helped me win

[04:21.19]I sincerely like to thank you

[04:23.38]Cuz now I got the world swingin' from my nuts

[04:26.09]And damn it feels good to be a gangsta
